official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Treasury to coin and issue a 2-cent piece emblematic of the Bicentennial of the American Revolution.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to coin and issue a two-cent piece emblematic of the Bicentennial of the American Revolution.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Treasury to coin and issue a 2-cent piece emblematic of the Bicentennial of the American Revolution.
